title: Locate
text: Locate the thousands place in the number

title: Value
text: What is the value of the thousands place?

title: Next Value
text: Check the next value to the right of the indicated thousands number

title: Rule
text: If the number to the right of the thousands number is greater than or equal to 5 then add one to the thousands place number and make everything after to 0s. If it is less than 5, then leave the thousands place number the same and change everything after to 0s.
